text: @MattHancock @BorisJohnson Mr Hancock/Johnson, can you explain why a govt press statement dated 31/03 states “Pregnant women in custody who do not pose a high risk of harm to the public will be temporarily released from prison within days to protect them and their unborn children from coronavirus.” Yet...
